item.title: [TIL] Starting Ruby Method With Capital Letter
item.description: [TIL] Starting Ruby Method With Capital Letter Last day while I was browing through some Java code online, I noticed that some method names it had were starting with capital letters. I have always used method names in ruby to be in small letter and use snake case. But it made me wonder if there was anything preventing us from using method names starting with capital letter, in ruby. So I started my irb and wrote the following code.
